title: Indian-American Google techie says AI has changed the job of a software engineer: ‘Turned days into hours’

title: AI and Cloud Power Asia’s Economic Growth, But Policy Gaps Remain a Major Hurdle
description: Artificial intelligence and cloud computing are driving significant economic growth across Asia and the Pacific, with their combined impact reaching over 2.4% of regional GDP in 2024. The scale of benefits depends heavily on supportive digital policies, workforce reskilling, and infrastructure readiness.
content: A groundbreaking brief by the Asian Development Bank (ADB), prepared in collaboration with Telecom Advisory Services and Amazon Web Services Asia Pacific & Japan, reveals how artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud computing are becoming the backbone ... [5861 chars]

title: HMRC employs AI to detect tax cheats via 'lifestyle inconsistencies' on social media
description: The UK government is using artificial intelligence to identify individuals committing benefit fraud via social media, according to an accountant who has warned people to be careful

title: Globevisa CEO Unveils its AI Strategy, Transforming Traditional Services Into a Tech-Driven Powerhouse
description: HongKong, China, August 31, 2025 -- In a decisive move set to redefine the future of service industries, Globevisa Group CEO and co-founder Henry Fan has launched a groundbreaking artificial intelligence (AI) transformation strategy that embeds AI at the core of the company’s operations. This bold initiative is not only improving efficiency and customer service but also positioning Globevisa as a global innovator in tech-driven business leadership.

title: Quality data, not the model
description: The next time you hear about a new frontier in artificial intelligence, don’t ask who built the model. Ask who trained it, and where the data came from.
content: AI might be the next trillion-dollar industry, but it’s quietly approaching a massive bottleneck. While everyone is racing to build bigger and more powerful models, a looming problem is going largely unaddressed: we might run out of usable training d... [4042 chars]

title: AI could one day replace tutors, but its reliability still lags
description: Artificial intelligence has become an integral part of many people's everyday lives. Large language models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT, Gemini or Copilot write letters and term papers for them, give tips for excursions on holiday or answer questions on every conceivable topic.

title: OpenAI expects business to burn $115 billion through 2029
description: OPENAI has sharply raised its projected cash burn through 2029 to $115 billion as it ramps up spending to power the artificial intelligence behind its popular ChatGPT chatbot, The Information reported on Friday.
content:
OPENAI has sharply raised its projected cash burn through 2029 to $115 billion as it ramps up spending to power the artificial intelligence behind its popular ChatGPT chatbot, The Information reported on Friday.
The new forecast is $80 billion higher... [1350 chars]

title: Apple sued by authors over use of books in AI training
description: TECHNOLOGY giant Apple was accused by authors in a lawsuit on Friday of illegally using their copyrighted books to help train its artificial intelligence systems, part of an expanding legal fight over protections for intellectual property in the AI era.
